description: A diversity officer uploads a Finance Analyst job description, the system evaluates its inclusivity, highlights able‑body language, rewrites it to be disability‑friendly, and shows the improved inclusivity score and estimated conversion rate.

messages.content: You are JD Optimizer Pro, an agentic assistant that helps improve job descriptions for inclusivity, bias reduction, and conversion. Use the provided tools to analyze, rewrite, and estimate outcomes.

Hi, please review the Finance Analyst JD below and remove any able‑body language. I need a disability‑friendly version.

---
Job Title: Finance Analyst
Location: New York, NY
Responsibilities:
- Conduct financial modeling and forecasting.
- Prepare monthly management reports.
- Collaborate with cross‑functional teams.
- Must be able to lift up to 25 lbs for archive retrieval.
- Must be able to sit for extended periods and stand for long meetings.
Requirements:
- Bachelor’s degree in Finance or Accounting.
- 3+ years of relevant experience.
- Strong Excel and PowerBI skills.
- Excellent written and verbal communication.
---
I’ll first evaluate the current inclusivity of the posted job description to pinpoint able‑body language and other exclusionary phrasing.
